title: About BJJ Schedule
description: Learn about our mission to connect the global Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu community through our class scheduling platform.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: BJJ Schedule was created with a simple mission: to make Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu more accessible to everyone around the world. We believe that by providing a centralized platform for finding and managing BJJ classes, we can help practitioners stay consistent with their training, discover new academies while traveling, and connect with the global BJJ community.

values.title: Global Connection
values.description: We aim to connect BJJ practitioners and academies worldwide, breaking down geographical barriers.

values.title: Community Building
values.description: We foster a sense of community among BJJ practitioners, instructors, and academy owners.

values.title: Accessibility
values.description: We make information about BJJ classes easily accessible to everyone, regardless of location or language.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: BJJ Schedule was born out of a personal frustration experienced by our founder, a dedicated BJJ practitioner who frequently traveled for work. Finding local academies and their class schedules was always a challenge, often requiring extensive research across multiple websites, social media platforms, and phone calls. This experience highlighted the need for a centralized platform that would make this information readily available to the global BJJ community.

timeline.title: The Idea (2023)
timeline.description: The concept for BJJ Schedule was born during a business trip when our founder struggled to find local BJJ classes.

timeline.title: Development Begins (2024)
timeline.description: We assembled a team of BJJ enthusiasts with technical expertise to start building the platform.

timeline.title: Beta Launch (2024)
timeline.description: We launched the beta version of BJJ Schedule with a select group of academies in major cities.

timeline.title: Global Expansion (2025)
timeline.description: We expanded our platform to include academies worldwide and added support for multiple languages.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: BJJ Schedule is built by a dedicated team of BJJ practitioners and technology enthusiasts who are passionate about connecting the global BJJ community.
